page.title: 02A WELSH CUSTOM
page.content: WALES IS STEEPED IN TRADITION AND CUSTOMS.ONE OF THESE CUSTOMS TAKES PLACE ON{MARCH 1st}.THE PATRON SAINT OF WALES IS{SAINT DAVID}.THE DAY WE CELEBRATE SAINT DAVID'S DAY IS MARCH 1st.ON THIS DAY CONCERTS ARE PERFORMED IN ALL SCHOOLS,NOT ONLY THE LOCAL WELSH SPEAKING SCHOOLS,BUT ALL INFANT,PRIMARY AND SECONDARY SCHOOLS.THESE CONCERTS ARE PERFORMED IN WELSH BY ALL THE CHILDREN.THEY TAKE THE FORM OF SONGS,SKETCHES,POEMS AND THE PLAYING OF WELSH FOLK SONGS. MOST INFANT AND JUNIOR SCHOOL CHILDREN DRESS UP IN THEIR NATIONAL COSTUME.THE CONCERT USUALLY TAKES PLACE ON THE MORNING OF MARCH 1st AND THE AFTERNOON IS{A NATIONAL HOLIDAY FOR SCHOOLS.
